name: LittleIC_Ludum Dare47
description:
**Game is made  for LudumDare47 Compo mode**

**made with Unity by Amin Jalali Karveh (AminJK000)**

**Source Code included with comments

Controls: 

- WASD keys  for movment

- E for picking and T for Throwing

Tutorial:

you are a little IC (Integrated Circuit) under an RGB keyboard. Your task is to deliver 10 signals from a random key to the cable. Each time you deliver a signal 1 way to the signal will be closed. Hope you guys enjoy :) .
